body.name: Tommee Tippee Nighttime pacifiers, 6-18 months, 6 pack of glow in the dark pacifiers with symmetrical silicone baglet

features: Symmetrical design: Tommee Tippee night time pacifiers feature a symmetrical silicone nipple and with no ‘wrong’ side up, it will always be placed correctly in baby’s mouth.
Acceptance guaranteed: Accepted by 97.5% of babies, the 100% medical-grade, BPA-free silicone nipple is soft, flexible but extremely durable and won’t absorb stains and odors
Mom recommended: Loved by moms and babies, our night time pacifiers help to settle baby, with 99% of moms reporting they would recommend our pacifiers to others
Kind on baby’s skin: The curved shield ensures a comfortable fit between baby’s nose and chin and the large holes allow extra air flow and prevent moisture build-up to help prevent skin irritation
Glow in the dark handle: The glow in the dark handle allows parents to locate the pacifier in a dark room without having to disturb baby
body.description: The instinctive action of sucking helps to calm and soothe babies and all parents know theres nothing more wonderful than a calm, content baby. Our night time pacifiers feature ingenious glow in the dark handles, so parents can locate the pacifier in a dark room without having to disturb baby. As the symmetrical silicone baglet is fully reversible, there is no wrong side-up so the pacifier will always be placed correctly in your babys mouth, even when they put it in their mouth themselves. The curved shield sits comfortably between babys chin and nose and the holes in each side allow extra air flow and prevent the build-up of moisture which helps to protect babys delicate skin against irritation. The BPA-free silicone baglet is soft and flexible whilst also being robust and durable. The smooth surface of silicone is very easy to clean and wont absorb stains and odors. Simply pop in a sterilizer, wash by hand or in the dishwasher. We recommend that you replace the pacifier every month and always at the first signs of damage or wear. We recommend against prolonged pacifier use over 24 months and stopping pacifier use when your child is older than 36 months. *From an independent study in July 2021 of 416 moms with a 0-36m child, who are currently using a Tommee Tippee pacifier: **99% of moms would recommend a Tommee Tippee pacifier **97% of moms say a Tommee Tippee pacifier helped settle baby **93% of moms say babies love their Tommee Tippee pacifier **97.5% accepted a Tommee Tippee pacifier Warning! Do not tie pacifier around childs neck as it presents a strangulation danger.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Symmetrical design As the symmetrical silicone baglet is fully reversible, there is no ‘wrong’ side-up so the pacifier will always be placed correctly in your baby’s mouth, even when they put it in their mouth themselves. Acceptance guaranteed Accepted by 97.5% of babies**, our night time pacifier baglets are made from 100% medical-grade silicone. Silicone is a soft and flexible but extremely durable material. Love by moms and babies, our pacifiers help to settle baby with 99% of moms recommending to others. * Ultimate comfort The pacifier shield curves at the top and the bottom to ensure that it sits comfortably between baby’s chin and nose. The holes in the shield allow extra air flow and prevent the build-up of moisture thereby helping to protect baby’s delicate skin against irritation.

Glow in the dark Traditional shield style with modern but understated designs suitable for use anytime, anywhere. Featuring an ingenious glow in the dark handle so parents can locate the pacifier in a dark room. Available in different age stages Our 0-6-m size features a smaller nipple and shield for tiny mouths and noses. As your baby grows, we recommend you move up through the age stages to the 6-18m and 18-36m pacifiers which offer the same benefits but with larger nipples and shields. Easy to clean & BPA-free Silicone is taste-free and won’t retain any stains or odors. Easy to clean either in a sterilizer, by hand or in the top rack of the dishwasher. Always BPA and phthalate-free for your ultimate reassurance.

Can I use a pacifier while breastfeeding? Yes of course. All Tommee Tippee pacifiers feature symmetrical baglets which closely resemble the natural shape of a mother’s nipple, therefore reducing the risk of confusion between nipple and pacifier. All Tommee Tippee pacifiers are suitable for use from birth but you should consult medical advice regarding when to introduce a pacifier to your baby if you are breastfeeding.How often should I replace my baby’s pacifier?We recommend that you replace the pacifier every month and always at the first signs of damage or weakness. We recommend against prolonged pacifier use over 24 months and stopping pacifier use when your child is older than 36 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Accepted by my baby
reviews.reviewText: These pacifiers are great for the value, my baby likes them and the glow in the dark feature is great for the night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love these binkies because they can comfortably go in his mouth either way and they glow! When my baby wakes in the middle of the night I can find the binkie and put it back in his mouth without turning on the light and waking him

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Daughter loves these! They work well and are so cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Pacifier Out There
reviews.reviewText: We've used these with both our kids. We love them they instantly sooth our daughter and did the same for our son. We love that they can go either way babies comfort and soothed either way. The glow in the dark is a major bonus. I recommend to everyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My babies favorite binkies
reviews.reviewText: We got a few of these for our baby shower. We liked them so much we got more. Our baby loves them and we love that they glow in the dark!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My baby likes
reviews.reviewText: Great binkies that the baby likes! They can easily be joined to a binky holder also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST PACI OR BINKY OR WHATEVER YOU CALL IT WHERE YOU'RE FROM
reviews.reviewText: My eldest kids never really liked pacifiers. Now the AAP recommends them as a way to help prevent SIDS (shown in peer-reviewed journal articles) and no, I am not making any claims that by buying this product you will prevent SIDS. It's what the AAP recommends. That's it. Like they recommend babies sleep on their back, right?I recommend these because those stupid hospital binkies are horrible and hard for the baby to keep in their mouth because there is no side. I told my sister to buy these for her new baby. Her boyfriend disagreed and wanted to use the one from the hospital. I told him. Now he's buying these and went in the middle of the night to be sure he had a Tommee Tippee for his baby.My youngest babies will not use any other binky. Elder of the kids spit out every other kind. This was round six or so of trying binkies. Worked like a charm. Works like a charm for my new baby. I won't buy or recommend any other brand. They are a waste of money and your baby might not like you for giving them a binky they don't like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love these, but the glow in the dark lasted longer.
reviews.reviewText: We exclusively use Tommee Tippee’s pacifiers for our son. He won’t take any others. These are super cute, but the glow in the dark feature doesn’t even come close to lasting all night. I’d say they last maybe a 2-3 hours, but they dim quickly. I also wish they were the same design as the non-glow in the dark pacifiers where it can be put in the mouth either way. My son is constantly putting these in upside down.
These are my babies favourite! Only ones that she will take

reviews.reviewTitle: très utiles la nuit dans le noir
reviews.reviewText: Tétines pas très originales mais font très bien l'affaire, le côté phosphorescent fonctionne parfaitement (attention, il faut un peu de temps pour que cela vienne après sortie de la boîte). En plus le rapport qualité/ fonctionnalité / prix est canon! donc je recommande

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This multipack provides a nice variety of neutral colours with glow in the dark handles.

Ottimi ciucci, preferiti del mio bimbo (gli altri non li vuole, ne ho provati diversi ma piange e non li tiene in bocca, mentre questi li cerca proprio). Si illuminano al buio, per cui la notte quando gli cade lo trovo subito. Sembrano anche resistenti e ben fatti. Super consigliati, anche per il prezzo.
